name: Super Captain 3D
description: Super Captain 3D is a shoot-em-up game where you become a Super Hero ready to fight the Pixel Invaders. It features an art style that combines 3D pre-renders with 2D pixel art. Use your Superpowers to protect the Universe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 or greater DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 120 MB available space
